hero.title: learn. launch. lead
hero.subtitle: Explore action-focused WhatsApp sprints and mentorships designed to take you from idea to income—one solo step at a time

zones.name: Stage 0: Still Thinking
zones.description: For curious or risk-averse solopreneurs who want low-cost, low-pressure clarity.

courses.title: Idea Spark + Mentorship
courses.hook: Spark your first viable business idea
courses.summary: 2-day WhatsApp video micro-lessons + 1:1 mentor call to help you find and validate your direction
curriculum: Day 1: Identify skills, passions, and natural strengths
Day 2: Match your skill with a market need using our Idea Validation Framework
1:1 mentor call to validate and prioritise your best idea
Bonus: "From Confusion to Clarity" Roadmap (PDF)

zones.name: Stage 1: Curious
zones.description: For solopreneurs ready to validate their ideas and take the first steps.

courses.title: Idea to Income + Mentorship
courses.hook: Convert your idea into an income-ready offer
courses.summary: 5-day WhatsApp video sprint + 1:1 mentor call to help you structure and launch your offer
curriculum: Day 1: Define your niche and ideal client
Day 2: Create your first offer (problem, promise, price)
Day 3: Position your offer to communicate value
Day 4: Map out your first-client strategy
Day 5: Prepare to deliver your offer confidently
1:1 mentor call to refine pitch, audience, and pricing
Bonus: Client Acquisition Toolkit

zones.name: Stage 2: Builder
zones.description: For solopreneurs ready to build a strong brand and consistent client base.

courses.title: Brand Builder Sprint (Complete Edition)
courses.hook: Build a brand that sticks, sells, and scales
courses.summary: 4-day WhatsApp video course + 2 Live Mentor Sessions to create your brand and content system
curriculum: Day 1: Brand Pillars → Niche, messaging, voice, and persona
Day 2: Content Framework → Plug-and-play content system
Day 3: Client Conversion System → Set up funnel & messaging
Day 4: Trust Loops & Growth Hacks → Proof and visibility
2 LIVE mentor sessions for content and pitch refinement
Custom 90-Day Brand Roadmap

zones.name: Stage 3: Scaler
zones.description: For established solopreneurs ready to scale their impact and income.

courses.title: Solo Scaler + Mentorship
courses.hook: Systematise and scale your solo business
courses.summary: 5-day WhatsApp course + 1:1 mentor call to help you create systems that scale
curriculum: Day 1: Audit current systems & income blockers
Day 2: Implement automation tools (Calendly, Notion, CRM)
Day 3: Create a referral and repeat business engine
Day 4: Design scalable offers (group coaching, courses, retainers)
Day 5: Troubleshooting session- LIVE
1:1 mentor call to create your custom scale plan

zones.name: Stage 4: Relaunch
zones.description: For professionals ready to restart their journey with clarity and support.

courses.title: Career Re-launcher + Mentorship
courses.hook: Relaunch your career or venture with confidence
courses.summary: 5-day WhatsApp journey + 2 LIVE mentor calls to help you make a strong comeback
curriculum: Day 1: Rediscover monetizable skills
Day 2: Rebuild confidence & gather proof
Day 3: Explore flexible and pay-worthy options
Day 4: Positioning and pricing post-break
Day 5: Create your comeback roadmap
2 LIVE mentor calls for confidence and client attraction
